an5.254:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these five kinds of stinginess.
an5.254:1.3: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material things, praise, and the teachings.
an5.254:1.4: These are the five kinds of stinginess.
an5.254:1.5: The most contemptible of these five kinds of stinginess is stinginess with the teachings.”
